column5: Pretty much sums it up. I think there are some pretty delirious guys around here, lol!
I think you're right. If you look at the classifieds, you'll notice that a lot of guys are selling or trading their happiness for newer happinesses.
As soon as you buy the latest happiness, some one goes and introduces a new IMPROVED happiness. So we can always have something to be happy about.
I love happy,but happy costs a heck of a lot!!.
JDM happiness works very well over here as well!
I am the happiest man right now.  Got my new fly reel and the rod comes soon lol.
i have been living off the same ol happiness for years now...lol
We really need George Carlin to rewrite "more stuff" to "more happiness"!  Too bad that ain't gonna happen!  Michael
How about baseball and football to bass and Muskie!
True.......BUT my happiness quickly turns into sorrow when she finds out how much happiness I bought.
Happiness is easy to apologize for rather than ask for permission

HahahahahahahHhHha Funny you should say that. Last summer at angling outfitters I picked up a new fly reel. Josh had it marked down from $150 to $99. I bought it and asked him to put a $49.99 sticker on it for me. He laughed when I told him the wife would be happy that I got what I wanted for less then half of what I was willing to spend. Let's just say we were both full of "happiness" that day.

Nice one!! HA  With eTackle I can change what name reflects on the customers credit card statement.  I was considering something along the lines of "Gifts for Her" or "MAC Makeup"  but thought the single guys may not appreciate it.
Very cool poster, eTackle should sell it, if it doesn't already
PS. I think the point of the poster is that fishing is happiness, not gear, the gear is just the enabler. Actually I don't think so, I know so, from plenty of first hand experience.
